marklogic.body: One of the main reasons we selected the home in our current neighborhood is because of all the trees on our property. We live on a corner lot and the side trees really help keep our house cooler in the summer. We absolutely love our backyard trees - they offer plenty of shade, privacy, and fun wildlife (so many birds!) for us to enjoy. The trees allow us to tolerate the Heat during the summer, which is a plus for all of us - dog included. Perhaps my favorite use of our big oak is that is holds our son's swing. I will Always remember sitting under the tree and pushing him. Our trees have definitely given us some wonderful memories in addition to adding curb appeal and some financial savings. I also have to say that I love the idea of giving a tree as a housewarming gift. In addition, I think it serves as a beautiful baby gift. How special to watch them both grow! Thanks for the article!
